title: Collection of images doesn't start automatically
content:
After creating a provider integration in Image Aggregation, the collection of images doesn't start automatically.

Cause

This issue may occur if the RabbitMQ service is down, undergoing restart, or already restarted.

Solution

Run the following commandsÂ to rerun the cmp-bootstrap job by performing helm upgrade:

helm get values <ESM_RELEASE_NAME> -n <ESM_NAMESPACE> > my-values.yaml
helm upgrade <ESM_RELEASE_NAME> <ESM_CHART_FILE> -n <ESM_NAMESPACE> -f my-values.yaml
